duties_responsibilities.duty: Drive improved equipment reliability through quality workmanship and best maintenance practices.
Lead and direct a team of hourly General Maintenance personnel.
Coordinate with Maintenance Planners to ensure all preventive maintenance activities are scheduled and completed.
Initiate work orders and ensure work is performed safely.
Provide technical assistance and creative thinking in planning and coordination meetings for cost-effective solutions to mechanical and instrumentation issues.
Prioritize work assignments, consulting with Reliability/Planning Engineers on contracted work.
Collaborate with operators to understand operational issues and mentor and coach technical mastery of operations/maintenance personnel.
Assist in development and execution of

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Engineering or a related field (Master's preferred)
